explains: adj. 可爱的，讨人喜欢的

sentences.en: His vulnerability makes him even more lovable.
sentences.cn: 他的弱点甚至使他显得更可爱。

sentences.en: One could mention many lovable traits in Smee.
sentences.cn: 斯迈身上可以列举出很多可爱的特质。

sentences.en: To tell poor Smee that they thought him lovable!
sentences.cn: 告诉可怜的斯密，他们认为他可爱！
